title: Oregon
alt: A century later, the harrowing flight of the survivors from Oregon was dramatized in a popular video game.
transcript:
History of 19th-century Oregon[Timeline, with relevant images next to various dates.]1805
[Two men stand at the edge of a cliff. One has a walking staff.]
Arrival of Lewis & Clark1825
Early settlers arrive1841
Oregon Trail established1843
Larger western migration begins1848
[A horse is pulling a covered wagon. A gun peeks out the back.]
Huge wave of 500,000+ settlers arrives from Missouri. Largely children and adolescents, most bring nothing but cartloads of bullets for hunting.1849
[Cueball and Megan with rifles aim at something.]
Overhunting begins to devastate ecosystem 
Dysentery epidemic.1850
[Tombstones and bodies.]
Shooting deaths skyrocket
Typhoid epidemic
Measles epidemic
Cholera epidemic1851
All mammals larger than squirrels wiped out by overhunting
Massive famine1852
[Sun low over a land, devoid of life. Scattered remains of corpses and skeletons.]
Last survivors flee
Oregon territory abandoned
